segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out of the sink, and she doesn't even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is being so daring, standing on that stool like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching him, he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so cute, waiting for her cookie like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so inviting, I wish I was out there instead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's dress is getting wet, but she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get caught taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is really wobbling, someone should help that boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman finishes drying the dishes soon and notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
